thread.title: Simon Hargrave
thread.title_full: Battery Force reviewed by Simon Hargrave

author: Simon Hargrave
title: Simon Hargrave
text: Battery Force is always the first place I look when I need batteries. I don't always buy from them, but on the rare times I haven't it has been because they were out of stock of the specific item I wanted. Their prices are reasonable; their service fast and reliable. I have never had any complaint with them.
